document.full_text: the s&p 500 extended its slide to a fourth day on monday, hitting its lowest level since march 18, as a spate of recent weak u.s. data lent support to a bearish outlook for the economy.
document.title: wall street hits 2-1/2 month low on economic worry
lines_and_colors: the s&p 500 extended its slide to a fourth day on monday, hitting its lowest level since march 18, as a spate of recent weak u.s. data lent support to a bearish outlook for the economy.
